## JupyterHub at University of Hamburg

1. Open <https://code.min.uni-hamburg.de/>
1. Click on `File` > `New Launcher`
1. At the bottom, select `Terminal`
1. In the Terminal, enter:

    ```bash
    git clone {{< var project.source >}}
    ```

1. Next, enter:

    ```bash
    uv sync --frozen
    ```

1. Finally, enter:

    ```bash
    uv run quarto render
    ```

1. From the sidebar on the left, you can now open the exercise notebooks:

    - `exercise1.ipynb`
    - `exercise2.ipynb`
